metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000426 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - untriaged
metadata.description:
MapProxy version 1.10.3 and older is vulnerable to a Cross Site Scriptingattack in the demo service resulting in possible information disclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000426` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mapproxy - 1.11.0-1
python-mapproxy - 1.11.0-1
python3-mapproxy - 1.11.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mapproxy package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.0-1').
